Title: Establishes a private right of action against gun industry members for marketing firearms and firearm related products to minors
Summary: Prohibits gun industry members from marketing firearms and firearm related products to minors; excepts instances where marketing is geared toward hunting purposes; establishes a private right of action for violations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to establishing a private right of action against gun industry members for marketing firearms and firearm related products to minors
